            def generate_pdf(filename = 'Download')
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
              @organisation_name = co.name

              # If wkhtmltopdf is working...
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1
          
              begin
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
                html = render_to_string(:layout => false)

      109.

          1
          
                kit = PDFKit.new(html, :page_size => 'A4', :header_right => 'Printed on [date]')
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111.

      113.

      114.

                send_data(kit.to_pdf, :filename => "#{@organisation_name} #{filename}.pdf",
        
      115.

      119.

      120.

      136.

      166.

      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
            # Show a one-off notification to a user, to notify of
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
            # a specific event happening.
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
            #
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
            # With #show_notification_once, a notification of a given type (e.g. a 'convener_welcome' notification) will only be shown once
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
            # to a given user. If you want to show the notification regardless of whether the user has already seen it before,
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
            # use #show_notification instead.
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
            #
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
            # As an exception to this, you can pass the ignore_earlier_than parameter. If this user has seen this type of notification
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
            # earlier than the timestamp you pass, the notification will be shown again.
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
            #
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
            # @param [Symbol] notification the notification type, `:founding_proposal_passed` or `:founding_proposal_failed`
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
            # @param [optional, Timestamp] ignore seen-notifications earlier than this time
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
            # @return [String] notification the string relating to the kind of notification `founding_proposal_passed`.
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
            #
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
            # @example Show a notification a user once that their proposal failed, allowing us to render the partial 'founding_proposal_failed' in the view
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
            #   show_notification_once(:founding_proposal_failed)
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
            #

              return unless current_user

      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          25
          
              show_notification(notification)
        
      188. 
      
        
    188.

            def load_analytics_events_from_session

      45.

          3
          
                @founder.member_class = @association.member_classes.find_by_name('Founder')
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          3
          
                if !@founder.save
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  errors << "Cannot create your account: #{@founder.errors.full_messages.to_sentence}."
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              # display errors
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          3
          
              if errors.size > 0
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = errors.join("\n") # don't want to insert <br>s here
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                render :action => 'new'
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                return
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              # continue
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          3
          
              log_in(@founder)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          3
          
              MembersMailer.welcome_founder(@founder).deliver # send welcome email    
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          3
          
              current_user.update_attribute(:last_logged_in_at, Time.now.utc) # update login datetime
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          3
          
              track_analytics_event('EntersPendingStage')
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          3
          
              if Setting[:single_organisation_mode]
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                redirect_to(constitution_path)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              else
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          3
          
                redirect_to(constitution_url(host_and_port(@association.host)))
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
            end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          2
          
          protected
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
            # In single organisation mode, you need a guard to
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
            # stop being able to overwrite information about an
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
            # organisation once it's first been created.
        
      77.

          private
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
          
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
            # Create csv file of members in an org, then send data
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
            # as a file stream for downloads.
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
            #
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
            # @see http://api.rubyonrails.org/classes/ActionController/Streaming.html#method-i-send_data
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          2
          
            def generate_csv
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
              case co
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              when Association
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                # Only Associations use the 'inducted_at' field.
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
                fields = [:first_name, :last_name, :email, :inducted_at, :last_logged_in_at]
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
              end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
              # In Ruby 1.9, FasterCSV is provided as the stdlib's CSV library.
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
              csv_library = defined?(FasterCSV) ? FasterCSV : CSV
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1
          
              csv = csv_library.generate do |csv|
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
                csv << fields
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                @members.each do |member|
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          24
          
                  csv << fields.collect { |f| member.send(f) }
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
              filename = case co
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
              when Association
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
                "#{co.name} Members.csv"
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
              send_data(csv,
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                :filename => filename,
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                :type => 'text/csv',
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                :disposition => 'attachment'
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
              )
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
            end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          end
        
      165.

            # If the given path is not in fact a path, but is a full URL, then
        
      58. 
      
        
    58.

      59. 
      
        
    59.

      60. 
      
        
    60.

      61.

      62.

            def get_satisfaction_widget
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          531
          
              return unless Rails.env.production?
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              raw <<-EOC
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
                <script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                  var is_ssl = ("https:" == document.location.protocol);
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                  var asset_host = is_ssl ? "https://s3.amazonaws.com/getsatisfaction.com/" : "http://s3.amazonaws.com/getsatisfaction.com/";
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                  document.write(unescape("%3Cscript src='" + asset_host + "javascripts/feedback-v2.js' type='text/javascript'%3E%3C/script%3E"));
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                </script>
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                <script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                  var feedback_widget_options = {};
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                  feedback_widget_options.display = "overlay";  
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                  feedback_widget_options.company = "oneclickorgs";
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                  feedback_widget_options.placement = "left";
        
      15. 
      
        
    15.

      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  feedback_widget_options.style = "idea";
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                  var feedback_widget = new GSFN.feedback_widget(feedback_widget_options);
        
      18.

            def google_analytics_code
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          531
          
              return unless Rails.env.production? && OneClickOrgs::GoogleAnalytics.active?
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              analytics_js = <<-EOC
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                var _gaq = _gaq || [];
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                _gaq.push(['_setAccount', '#{OneClickOrgs::GoogleAnalytics.id}']);
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                _gaq.push(['_setDomainName', '#{OneClickOrgs::GoogleAnalytics.domain}']);
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                (function() {
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                  var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                })();
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              EOC
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              unless @analytics_events.blank?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                analytics_js += @analytics_events.map do |event|
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  "OneClickOrgs.trackAnalyticsEvent('#{event}');"
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                end.join("\n")
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              ['<script type="text/javascript">', analytics_js, '</script>'].join("\n").html_safe
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
            end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
            
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          2
          
            def error_messages_for(object)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          86
          
              messages = object.errors.full_messages.map do |message|
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          16
          
                content_tag(:li, message)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end.join
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          86
          
              content_tag(:ul, messages.html_safe, :class => 'errors')
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
            end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
            
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          2
          
            def organisation_name

              current_organisation.try(:name)

            def form_reveal_button(label, options={})
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          82
          
              options = options.with_indifferent_access
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          82
          
              form_id = options.delete(:form_id)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          82
          
              raise RuntimeError, "must specify form_id" if form_id.blank?
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          82
          
              options['data-form-id'] = form_id
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          82
          
              css_class = if options[:class].present?
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                options[:class] + ' button-form-show'
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              else
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          82
          
                'button-form-show'
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          82
          
              options[:class] = css_class
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          82
          
              options[:value] = label
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          82
          
              options[:type] = 'button'
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          82
          
              tag(:input, options)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
            end
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
            
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          2
          
            def link_button(label, options={})
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          458
          
              options = options.with_indifferent_access
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          458
          
              url = options.delete(:url)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          458
          
              raise RuntimeError, "must specify url" if url.blank?
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          458
          
              options['data-url'] = url
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          458
          
              css_class = if options[:class].present?
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                options[:class] + ' button-form'
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
              else
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          458
          
                'button-form'
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              end
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          458
          
              options[:class] = css_class
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          458
          
              options[:value] = label
        
      91.

      93.

      94. 
      
        
    94.

          class DecisionMailer < OcoMailer
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
            
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          2
          
            def notify_foundation_decision(member, decision)
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          28
          
              default_url_options[:host] = member.organisation.domain(:only_host => true)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          28
          
              @decision = decision
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          28
          
              @member = member
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          28
          
              raise ArgumentError, "need decision and member" unless @decision and @member
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          28
          
              @proposal = @decision.proposal
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          28
          
              raise ArgumentError, "decision has no attached proposal" unless @proposal
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          28
          
              @organisation = @proposal.organisation
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          28
          
              raise ArgumentError, "proposal has no attached organisation" unless @organisation
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          28
          
              @members = (@organisation.members.active + @organisation.members.pending)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          28
          
              @organisation_name = @organisation.name
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          28
          
              @member_vote = @member.votes.first
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          28
          
              if @proposal.passed? then
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          28
          
                create_mail(@organisation_name, @member.email, "Vote passed: #{@organisation_name} has been formed as an Association")
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              else
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                create_mail(@organisation_name, @member.email, "Vote did not pass: #{@organisation_name} has not been formed as an Association")
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              end
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
            end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          2
          
            def notify_new_decision(member, decision)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          50
          
              default_url_options[:host] = member.organisation.domain(:only_host => true)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          50
          
              @decision = decision
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          50
          
              @proposal = @decision.proposal
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          50
          
              @member = member
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          50
          
              @organisation_name = member.organisation.name
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          50
          
              raise ArgumentError, "need decision" unless @decision and @member
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          50
          
              raise ArgumentError, "decision has no attached proposal" unless @proposal
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          50
          
              create_mail(@organisation_name, @member.email, "Decision for proposal: #{@proposal.title}")
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          end
        
      41.

    app/mailers/directorship_mailer.rb

    100.0 % covered

    app/mailers/oco_mailer.rb

    58.62 % covered

    1. 
          2
          
          require 'one_click_orgs/mail_helper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          2
          
          class OcoMailer < ActionMailer::Base
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          2
          
            helper :application
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          2
          
            include ActionView::Helpers::TextHelper
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          2
          
            include OneClickOrgs::MailHelper
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          2
          
            default :from => "notifications@oneclickorgs.com"
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          2
          
            class EmailJob
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          2
          
              attr_reader :mail
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          2
          
              def initialize(mail)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                @mail = mail.encoded
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              end
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          2
          
              def perform
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                message = Mail::Message.new(mail)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                ActionMailer::Base.wrap_delivery_behavior(message)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                message.deliver!
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            # Helper method to create email according to the following conventions:
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            # * the sender is an OCO address, but is given the name of the current org
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
            # * there is one recipient
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
            # * the subject line will be truncated to 200 chars max, and any newlines will be stripped
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          2
          
            def create_mail(from_name, to, subject)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              mail(
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                :from => name_addr(from_name, 'notifications@oneclickorgs.com'),
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                :to => to, 
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          659
          
                :subject => truncate(subject, {:length => 200}).gsub(/[\r\n]+/, ' '))
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
            end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          2
          
            def self.deliver_mail(mail)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          639
          
              if !Rails.env.test? && worker_running?
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                Delayed::Job.enqueue EmailJob.new(mail)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              else
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          639
          
                Rails.logger.debug "Worker not running, falling back to direct sending"
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          639
          
                super
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          2
          
            def self.worker_running?
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              pid_file = File.join(Rails.root, 'tmp', 'pids', 'delayed_job.pid')
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              return false unless File.exist? pid_file
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              pid = IO.read(pid_file).strip.to_i
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              begin
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                !!Process.kill(0, pid)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              rescue Errno::ESRCH
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                false
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
            end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          end
        
      54.

    app/mailers/proposal_mailer.rb

    1.

          class ProposalMailer < OcoMailer

            def notify_foundation_proposal(member, proposal)
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          52
          
              default_url_options[:host] = member.organisation.domain(:only_host => true)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          52
          
              @member = member
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          52
          
              @proposal = proposal
        
      8.

            def voting_system(type = :general)

          require 'one_click_orgs/model_wrapper'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # Provides an ActiveModel like interface to a bundle of ConstitutionProposals.
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          # The attributes exposed are the constitution settings themselves (e.g. organisation_name,
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # voting_period, etc.), plus a single 'proposer' attribute.
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          2
          
          class ConstitutionProposalBundle < OneClickOrgs::ModelWrapper
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          2
          
            attr_accessor :organisation,
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              :organisation_name,
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              :objectives,
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              :assets,
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              :general_voting_system,
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              :membership_voting_system,
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              :constitution_voting_system,
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              :voting_period,
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              :proposer,
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              :proposals,
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              :registered_office_address, # Coop clauses
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              :user_members, :employee_members, :supporter_members, :producer_members, :consumer_members,
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              :single_shareholding,
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              :max_user_directors, :max_employee_directors, :max_supporter_directors, :max_producer_directors, :max_consumer_directors,
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              :common_ownership
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          2
          
            def after_initialize
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              # Load existing settings from organisation, if given, but don't
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              # overwrite new settings that have been passed directly in as attributes.
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          54
          
              if organisation
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          54
          
                case organisation
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                when Association
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          32
          
                  [:organisation_name, :objectives, :voting_period].each do |clause_name|
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          96
          
                    send("#{clause_name}=", organisation.constitution.send(clause_name)) unless send("#{clause_name}")
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          32
          
                  [:general, :membership, :constitution].each do |voting_system_type|
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          96
          
                    send("#{voting_system_type}_voting_system=", organisation.constitution.voting_system(voting_system_type).simple_name) unless send("#{voting_system_type}_voting_system")
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          32
          
                  self.assets = (!!organisation.constitution.assets ? '1' : '0') unless assets
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                when Coop
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  [
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          22
          
                    :organisation_name, :objectives, :registered_office_address,
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    :max_user_directors, :max_employee_directors, :max_supporter_directors, :max_producer_directors, :max_consumer_directors
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  ].each do |clause_name|
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          176
          
                    send("#{clause_name}=", organisation.constitution.send(clause_name)) unless send(clause_name)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  [
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          22
          
                    :user_members, :employee_members, :supporter_members, :producer_members, :consumer_members,
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    :single_shareholding,
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                    :common_ownership
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                  ].each do |clause_name|
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          154
          
                    send("#{clause_name}=", !!organisation.constitution.send(clause_name) ? '1' : '0') unless send(clause_name)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          54
          
              self.proposals ||= []
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
            end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          2
          
            def save
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          35
          
              case organisation
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              when Association
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          15
          
                build_proposals_for_association
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              when Coop
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          20
          
                build_proposals_for_coop
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              # Early exit?
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          35
          
              if proposals.empty?
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                errors.add(:base, "No changes were made")
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                return false
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              # Only save if we have no errors
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          35
          
              if errors.empty?
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          35
          
                proposals.each(&:save!)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          35
          
                true
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              else
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                false
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
              end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
            end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          2
          
            def persisted?
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          57
          
              false
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
            end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          2
          
          protected
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          2
          
            def build_proposals_for_association
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              # Organisation name
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          15
          
              if organisation.name != organisation_name
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          8
          
                proposal = (organisation.change_text_proposals.new(
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                  :name => 'organisation_name',
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  :value => organisation_name
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                ))
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          8
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          8
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          8
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                else
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:organisation_name, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              # Objectives
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          15
          
              if organisation.objectives != objectives
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          15
          
                proposal = (organisation.change_text_proposals.new(
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                  :name => 'organisation_objectives',
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                  :value => objectives
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                ))
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          15
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          15
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          15
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                else
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:objectives, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                end
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              end
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              # Assets
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          15
          
              if assets == '1'
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          7
          
                title = "Change the constitution to allow holding, transferral and disposal of material assets and intangible assets"
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          7
          
                new_assets_value = true
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              else
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          8
          
                title = "Change the constitution to prohibit holding, transferral or disposal of material assets and intangible assets"
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          8
          
                new_assets_value = false
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              end
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          15
          
              if (organisation.assets && !new_assets_value) || (!organisation.assets && new_assets_value) # Bit verbose, to cope with null values
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          7
          
                proposal = (organisation.change_boolean_proposals.new(
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  :title => title,
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                  :name => 'assets',
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                  :value => new_assets_value
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                ))
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          7
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          7
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          7
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                else
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:assets, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              end
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              # General voting system
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          15
          
              proposed_system = VotingSystems.get(general_voting_system)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          15
          
              current_system = organisation.constitution.voting_system :general
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          15
          
              if current_system != proposed_system
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          15
          
                proposal = (organisation.change_voting_system_proposals.new(
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                  :proposal_type => 'general',
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                  :proposed_system => proposed_system.simple_name
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                ))
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          15
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          15
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          15
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                else
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:general_voting_system, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
              # Membership voting system
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          15
          
              proposed_system = VotingSystems.get(membership_voting_system)
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          15
          
              current_system = organisation.constitution.voting_system :membership
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          15
          
              if current_system != proposed_system
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          8
          
                proposal = (organisation.change_voting_system_proposals.new(
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                  :proposal_type => 'membership',
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                  :proposed_system => proposed_system.simple_name
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                ))
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          8
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          8
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          8
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                else
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:membership_voting_system, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
              # Constitution voting system
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          15
          
              proposed_system = VotingSystems.get(constitution_voting_system)
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          15
          
              current_system = organisation.constitution.voting_system :constitution
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          15
          
              if current_system != proposed_system
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          8
          
                proposal = (organisation.change_voting_system_proposals.new(
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                  :proposal_type => 'constitution',
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                  :proposed_system => proposed_system.simple_name
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                ))
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          8
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          8
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          8
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                else
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:constitution_voting_system, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                end
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              end
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
          
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
              # Voting period
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          15
          
              if organisation.constitution.voting_period != voting_period.to_i
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          8
          
                proposal = organisation.change_voting_period_proposals.new(
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                  :new_voting_period => voting_period
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                )
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          8
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          8
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          8
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                else
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:voting_period, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                end
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
            end
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          2
          
            def build_proposals_for_coop
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          20
          
              ability = Ability.new(proposer)
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
              # Organisation name
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          20
          
              if organisation.name != organisation_name
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          20
          
                proposal = if ability.can?(:create, Resolution)
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          10
          
                  organisation.change_text_resolutions.build(
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                    :name => 'organisation_name',
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                    :value => organisation_name,
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                    :draft => true
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                  )
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                elsif ability.can?(:create, ResolutionProposal)
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          10
          
                  organisation.resolution_proposals.build(
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                    :resolution_class => 'ChangeTextResolution',
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                    :resolution_parameters => {
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                      :name => 'organisation_name',
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                      :value => organisation_name
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                    }
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                  )
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                end
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          20
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          20
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          20
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                else
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:organisation_name, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                end
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
              end
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
          
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
              # Objectives
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          20
          
              if organisation.objectives != objectives
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          20
          
                proposal = if ability.can?(:create, Resolution)
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          10
          
                  organisation.change_text_resolutions.build(
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                    :name => 'organisation_objectives',
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                    :value => objectives,
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                    :title => "Change objects to '#{objectives}'",
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                    :draft => true
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                  )
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                elsif ability.can?(:create, ResolutionProposal)
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          10
          
                  organisation.resolution_proposals.build(
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                    :title => "Change objects to '#{objectives}'",
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                    :resolution_class => "ChangeTextResolution",
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
                    :resolution_parameters => {
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
                      :name => 'organisation_objectives',
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
                      :value => objectives,
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
                    }
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
                  )
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
                end
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          20
          
                proposal.proposer = proposer
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          20
          
                if proposal.valid?
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          20
          
                  proposals.push(proposal)
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
                else
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:objectives, proposal.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
                end
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
              end
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
          
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
              # Registered office address
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          20
          
              if organisation.registered_office_address != registered_office_address
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          20
          
                proposal = if ability.can?(:create, Resolution)
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          10
          
                  organisation.change_text_resolutions.build(
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
                    :name => 'registered_office_address',
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
                    :value => registered_office_address,
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
                    :draft => true
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
                  )
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
                elsif ability.can?(:create, ResolutionProposal)
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          10
          
                  organisation.resolution_proposals.build(
        
      268.

      269.

            def update_attributes(options={})
        
      50.

          2
          
              case organisation

              when Association

          1

    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54.

          1

      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
                  new_assets_value = false
        
      60.

    61. 
          1

                  organisation.clauses.set_boolean!('assets', new_assets_value)

            def build_general_meeting_or_annual_general_meeting(attributes={})

          8
          
              attributes = attributes.dup.with_indifferent_access

      353.

          4

      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          4
          
                  annual_general_meetings.build(attributes)
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          
          
                rescue ActiveRecord::MultiparameterAssignmentErrors => e
        
      357. 
      
        
    357.

      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          
          
                end
        
      359. 
      
        
    359.

            def registration_form_filled?
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          
          
              [
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          24
          
                :membership_required
        
      431. 
      
        
    431. 
          72
          
              ].map{|name| "reg_form_#{name}"}.map{|name| !send(name).nil?}.inject(true){|memo, present| memo && present}
        
      432. 
      
        
    432. 
          
          
            end

          end

            def organisation
        
      7.

    app/models/founder_member.rb

    100.0 % covered

    1. 
          
          
          # A convenience class to allow creation of a Member model object, but using
        
      2.

          # 'FounderMember.new' instead of 'Member.new'.
        
      3.

      4.

          # It does not do anything beyond this (for example, it does not set the member class

      6.

          2
          
          class FounderMember < Member
        
      7.

            def cast_vote(action, proposal)
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          138
          
              raise ArgumentError, "need action and proposal" unless action and proposal

          138

      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          137

      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123.

      124.

      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          108

    app/models/officership.rb

    1. 
          2
          
          require 'one_click_orgs/cast_to_boolean'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # An Officership represents the period during which a particular
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          # person occupies a particular office.
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # 
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          # Each Office can only have one current Officership, but will have
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          # a history of many Officerships as different people occupy the
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          # Office.
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          # 
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          # Similarly, a Member can only have one current Officership (i.e.
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          # they can only occupy one Office at a time). But they may build
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          # up a history of many Officerships if they occupy several Offices
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          # in sequence.
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          2
          
          class Officership < ActiveRecord::Base
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          2
          
            include OneClickOrgs::CastToBoolean

    16.

      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          2
          
            def officer_name
        
      27.

      28.

            end
        
      29.

      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          2
          
            def office_title
        
      31.

            def abstained
        
      127.

              member_count - total_votes

    128.

      129.

      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          2
          
            def total_votes
        
      131. 
      
        
    131.

          # A ResolutionProposal is a proposed resolution. In other words, it is not
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          # a resolution itself, but rather it is a suggested resolution.
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # It is created when a Member of a Co-op wants to suggest a Resolution.
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          # The ResolutionProposal is 'passed' if the Directors/Secretary agree
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # to open the suggested resolution to a vote. At that point, the
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          # 'real' Resolution is created.

            def self.[](the_key)

          6771

          6771

            PERIODS = [300, 86400, 259200, 604800, 1209600] # in seconds
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
            
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          2
          
            def self.name_for_value(value)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          211
          
              value = value.to_i
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          211
          
              case value
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              when 0..3600
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          28
          
                minutes = (value / 60.0).round
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          28
          
                if minutes == 1
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                  "1 minute"
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                else
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          28
          
                  "#{minutes} minutes"
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                end
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          183
          
              when 3601..(86400-1)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                hours = (value / 3600.0).round
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                if hours == 1
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                  "1 hour"
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                else
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  "#{hours} hours"
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              else
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          183
          
                days = (value / (3600.0 * 24)).round
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          183
          
                if days == 1
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          26
          
                  "1 day"
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                else
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          157
          
                  "#{days} days"
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
            end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          2
          
            def self.all(&block)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          156
          
              PERIODS.map{|p| {:name => name_for_value(p), :value => p}}.tap do |periods|

    33. 
          26
          
                periods.each(&block) if block

            # Base class for voting systems where a proposal needs to surpass a
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
            # treshold of votes (in relation to member count) to be accepted.
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          2
          
            class Majority < VotingSystem
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          2
          
              def self.fraction_needed=(f)
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          6
          
                @fraction_needed = f
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              end
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          2
          
              def self.can_be_closed_early?(proposal)
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          9
          
                (current_fraction_for(proposal) > @fraction_needed) || 
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          13
          
                (current_fraction_against(proposal) >= (1.0 - @fraction_needed)) 
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
              end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
              
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          2
          
              def self.passed?(proposal)
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          12
          
                current_fraction_for(proposal) > @fraction_needed
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          2
          
              private
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          2
          
              def self.current_fraction_for(proposal)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          21
          
                proposal.votes_for / proposal.member_count.to_f
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              end
        
      121.

            class Founding < VotingSystem

    193.

      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
              end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          2
          
              def self.can_be_closed_early?(proposal)
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                # We need to give all the founding members an opportunity to vote,
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                # so only close this proposal early if every member has cast a
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                # vote.
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          10
          
                proposal.total_votes >= proposal.member_count
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
              
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          2

      205.

                proposal.votes_for >= 3
        
      206.

              end
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
            end
        
      208.

      209.

            def self.all(&block)
        
      210.

              [
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          79
          
                RelativeMajority,
        
      212.

                AbsoluteMajority,
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                AbsoluteTwoThirdsMajority,
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                Unanimous,
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                Veto
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
              ].tap do |systems|
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          79
          
                systems.each(&block) if block
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
              end      
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
            end
        
      220.

          class DecisionMailerObserver < ActiveRecord::Observer
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          2
          
            observe :decision
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
            
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          2
          
            def after_create(decision)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          31
          
              send_notification_email(decision)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            end
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          2
          
          protected
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          2
          
            def send_notification_email(decision)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          31
          
              case decision.proposal
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              when FoundAssociationProposal
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          6
          
                decision.organisation.members.each do |m|
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          26
          
                  DecisionMailer.notify_foundation_decision(m, decision).deliver
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              else
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          25
          
                decision.organisation.members.active.each do |m|
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          56
          
                  DecisionMailer.notify_new_decision(m, decision).deliver
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                end
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            rescue => e
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
              Rails.logger.error("Error sending decision email: #{e.inspect}")
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          end
        
      25.

    14. 
          7

    15. 
          7

    16. 
          2

          13

            def after_create(member)

              when Coop

          264

    8. 
          245

    9. 
          19
          
                elsif member.organisation.pending?

            def send_welcome_if_requested(member)

            def timeline

    lib/one_click_orgs/organisation_resolver.rb

    100.0 % covered
