    1. 
          2
          
          require 'action_view/template/resolver'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          2
          
          module OneClickOrgs
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            # OrganisationResolver is a custom template resolver that provides for
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            # customisation of an entire template based on the kind of organisation
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            # we are dealing with.
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            # 
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
            # The resolver looks for customised templates in a subdirectory named after 
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            # the name of the class you specify at initialisation time. If a customised
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            # template cannot be found, it falls back to using the default template.
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            # 
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            # For instance, if you create a new OrganisationResolver like this:
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
            # 
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            #   OrganisationResolver.new(Rails.root + '/app/views', Company)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
            # 
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
            # and prepend the new resolver to your view paths, then an attempt to
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
            # render the +index+ action of the +people+ controller will try the
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
            # follwing templates in order until it finds one that exists:
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
            # 
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            # * <tt>app/views/people/company/index</tt>
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            # * <tt>app/views/people/index</tt>
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          2
          
            class OrganisationResolver < ActionView::FileSystemResolver
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              # +path+ is a root template path on the file system
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              # (e.g. <tt>Rails.root + '/app/views'</tt>).
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              # 
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              # +organisation_class+ is the Class for which you want to search for
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              # customised templates.
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          2
          
              def initialize(path, organisation_class)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1231
          
                super(path)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1231
          
                @organisation_class_name = organisation_class.name.underscore
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          2
          
            private
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          2
          
              def find_templates(name, prefix, partial, details)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          5591
          
                prefix_expansions = ["#{prefix}/#{@organisation_class_name}", prefix]
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          5591
          
                templates = []
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          5591
          
                prefix_expansions.each do |expanded_prefix|
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          11182
          
                  templates += super(name, expanded_prefix, partial, details)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          5591
          
                templates
        
      42.

      43.

    lib/one_click_orgs/parameters_hash.rb

    100.0 % covered

    7 relevant lines. 7 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          
          
          # A light wrapper around Hash that can retain a reference to a parent object.
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          # The reference is used to update the actual parameters attribute of the
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # parent when the parameters hash is naively updated by calling #[]= on
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          # it.
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          2
          
          class ParametersHash < Hash
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          2
          
            attr_accessor :parent
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
            # Returns a new ParametersHash with the contents of the given hash.
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          2
          
            def self.from_hash(hash)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          2622
          
              hash ? new.replace(hash) : new
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            end
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          2
          
            def []=(key, value)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          688
          
              parent.parameters = parent.parameters.merge({key => value})
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          688
          
              super
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
            end
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          end
        
      18.

    lib/one_click_orgs/parameters_serialisation.rb

    1. 
          2
          
          require 'one_click_orgs/parameters_hash'
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          2
          
          module OneClickOrgs
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          2
          
            module ParametersSerialisation
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              # Returns the (deserialized) hash of parameters for this object.
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              # You can call #[]= on the returned hash and it will magically update the
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              # actual parameters attribute of the object. In other words, this will
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              # just work:
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              # 
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              # proposal.parameters[:first_name] = "Bob"
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              # proposal.parameters[:first_name] # => "Bob"
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          2
          
              def parameters
